summary: Replaces the green hue of the Orc shield with a gray hue so that it matches the rest of the armor set.
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
SPARTAN VI\'s - Matching Orcish Shield
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Version: v1.0
Date: 11/27/2011
Category: Texture Replacer
Author: SPARTAN VI

Description
===========
For some reason the Orcish shield has much more green hues than the rest of the Orcish armor. 
So much so that it doesn\'t even match the armor set anymore.

This mod reduces the green hues so that the Orc shield matches the rest of the armor set.


Install
=======
1. Download.
2. Extract. Copy/Move Data folder to your Skyrim directory. 
3. Overwrite existing file.
4. Launch Skyrim!

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the \"orchshield.dds\" file located in your
   %Skyrim\\data\\textures\\armor\\orcish\\ directory

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
Please report bugs to me at skyrimnexus.com or bethsoft.com forums.

Contact
=======
If you want to get a hold of me, I\'m at the bethsoft forums as SPARTAN VI.


Tools Used
==========
Photoshop CS4- http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/


Licensing/Legal
===============
Feel free to do whatever you like with this mod (such as include it in a larger texture pack), no permission/credit necessary.
author: SPARTAN VI
